effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Metamorphosis for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 10 sec.
Set: The Hunt has a high chance to refresh its cooldown when you gain Luck of the Draw!
Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Metamorphosis for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 10 sec.
Set: The Hunt has a high chance to refresh its cooldown when you gain Luck of the Draw!

spell.description: Use: Increase your speed for a few seconds. (2 Min Cooldown)

spells.description:
Equip: Taking damage has a chance to grant you an Adrenal Surge, causing you to gain 3,151 Agility and lose 310 Mastery for 12 sec.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Metamorphosis for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 10 sec.
Set: The Hunt has a high chance to refresh its cooldown when you gain Luck of the Draw!

Set: The Hunt has a high chance to refresh its cooldown when you gain Luck of the Draw!

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Chromebustible Bomb Suit

spells.description:
Use: Rapidly deploy the bomb suit to reduce damage taken by 75% for 20 sec or until 8.9 million damage has been prevented.

Upon depletion, the bomb suit detonates to deal 767,247 Fire damage split between nearby enemies. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

description: When the only options are initial success or total failure.

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,303 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

spells.description: Equip: Damaging a target has a low chance to call upon the power of the Blessed Weapon Grip, granting you 10 stacks that increase your highest secondary stat by 185. These stacks fade over 30 sec.
Equip: Your autoattacks do an additional 3,485 Shadow damage.
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
